CustomField.description:
Non formula variant of the Account Status (Committed) field (https://retool.lightning.force.com/lightning/setup/ObjectManager/Account/FieldsAndRelationships/00N6e00000MhSuV/view)
Updated via the Account - After Save Automations. Currently used as a helper field in Contact - Before Save Automations to bypass a `Get Account` step.
External Systems Utilization: Polytomic
CustomField.label: Status (Committed)
